GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: THE TRUSTEE OF THE FILING ENTITY IS ALSO A MANAGER OF CHAN ZUCKERBERG INITIATIVE LLC ("CZI"). ACCORDINGLY, THE FILING ENTITY TECHNICALLY MAY BE CONSIDERED A RELATED ORGANIZATION OF THE ENTITIES LISTED IN RESPONSE TO PART XVII, LINE 2, GIVEN CZI'S RELATIONSHIP WITH THESE ENTITIES. THE FILING ENTITY, AND THESE ENTITIES, DO NOT SHARE OR EXCHANGE ANY INFORMATION. THE FILING ENTITY'S TRUSTEE IS THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF FACEBOOK. FACEBOOK ADMINISTERS A FEDERALLY-REGISTERED POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEE. THERE IS NO RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN FACEBOOK'S PAC AND THE FILING ENTITY. FURTHERMORE, NO INFORMATION IS SHARED OR EXCHANGED BETWEEN THE FILING ENTITY AND FACEBOOK, OR FACEBOOK'S PAC.
